title.value: V2 Table: Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes

description.value: Code system of concepts used to describe acceptable start and end times, as well as days of the week, for appointment or resource scheduling. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the SCV and APR segments.

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0294 (Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes, version 2.4)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was first defined
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
Whether code is considered 'backwards compatible' (whatever that means)

display.value: The preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

definition.value: The preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

display.value: The preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

definition.value: The preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

display.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day; NO = Day is not preferred
